testcase.name: REST API testing
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/tempconvert.asmx/CelsiusToFahrenheit" . passed And header Content-Type = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" ............. passed And request "Celsius=40" .................................................. passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response contains "104" ......................................... passed * match response //string == "104" ........................................ passed * match responseHeaders['Server'] == ['Microsoft-IIS/7.5'] ................ passed * match responseHeaders['Server'][0] == 'Microsoft-IIS/7.5' ............... passed * assert responseTime <= 2000 ............................................. passed
